title: Team
text:
The Rep²SI team will be an interdisciplinary group, with three postdoctoral research officer posts being advertised shortly!





Dr. Eleanor A. Power Assistant Professor, Dept. of Methodology London School of Economics






South Asian Ethnography Research Officer #1 Advertising for this post shortly!






South Asian Ethnography Research Officer #2 Advertising for this post shortly!






Experimental Games Research Officer Advertising for this post shortly!






Modelling Research Officer Advertising for this post in 2025

title: Rep²SI
text:
Rep²SI (Reputation and the Reproduction of Social Inequality) is a project based in the Deparment of Methodology at the London School of Economics, funded by a Research Leadership Award from the Leverhulme Trust.
This is a collaborative project, with an interdisciplinary team led by Eleanor Power. We will shortly be advertising for three postdoctoral research officer posts – keep an eye out!

title: Project Background
text:
This project grows out of Dr. Power’s earlier fieldwork and research in Tamil Nadu.
